1. How can you contact us ? Visit the contact section.

2. What products should I expect ? We only provide new products, offering our clients a 2 year warranty, including any repairs that we're not caused by the client and we're a factory issue.

3. Is it safe to buy from us ? Of course. We are using a highly secure server to store our information about our clients. Regarding deliveries, we have partnerships with the best of the best and your orders will arrive 1-3 working days maximum. The term for return is 2 weeks, in which the client can test our product/s and decide if the product will be kept or not.
